result.title: Strategic R&I Agenda (version 1)
result.description: The strategic R&I Agenda will identify, prioritise and structure the main EU-CHINA cooperation activities on sustainable urbanisation, for the 3-year lifetime of the CSA project as well as the long-term sustainability of the Innovation Platform. The Strategic R&I Agenda will set targets, identify pathways, scenarios and instruments, and create strategies and action plans for the EU-China cooperation on sustainable urbanization, based on surveys performed among Consortium Partners, Advisory Board and Stakeholders. The creation and updating of the Agenda will be led by NTNU and CCUD.
